name: Hedgemony
description:
Make space for your Hedgehogs, keep the bunnies out, and establish your Hedgemony.

Controls
  • Click and drag to claim land and carrots. Watch out, bunnies will take carrots and invade your hogs' space!
  • Click (repeatedly) in a growing claim to speed it up.
  • Deploy decoys to divert the bunnies' paths
Story so far

The Bunny Federation have continued their monopolization of all the carrots in the sector denying access to the freedom fighting Hedgehog Hedgemony.  

Under the orders of Commodore Naaslu the Hedgemony has sent their bravest captains to liberate the guarded carrots from the noses of the bunnies.  Armed with their grub grabbers the fleet sets out to collect more carrots than the bumbling bunnies.
